instruction: Who are the top 5 richest people in the world and what are their current net worth?
output: The five wealthiest individuals in the world, according to Forbes' Billionaires list, are Jeff Bezos of Amazon ($191.1B), Bill Gates of Microsoft ($145.8B), Bernard Arnault of LVMH ($114.6B), Warren Buffett of Berkshire Hathaway ($114.2B) and Mark Zuckerberg of Facebook ($84.5B). These five people, in total, have a combined net worth of over 630 billion dollars.
